preqs: NUR2002 or NUR2106, NUR2004 or NUR2206, NUR2104 or NUR2207.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0727, 3892, 4506, 4514}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR2002, NUR2106} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR2004, NUR2206} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR2104, NUR2207})

description: This clinical practice unit provides an introduction to the management of clients with complex and or life threatening health problems across the lifespan with a particular focus on the acute care needs of the ageing individual. A case based approach will be utilized to facilitate the integration of advance health assessment skills, evidenced based practice and application of ethical principles in the management of complex nursing situations.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
